[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1516221763113{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/single-resource-page-bg-colorol-1902×496.jpg) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-8 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1512511419080{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Sync Up to Align Sales & Marketing

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1513027140372{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #3a3042 !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

On-Demand Webinar
Air Date: Wed, Dec. 6, 2017
Duration: 1 hour

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1512597634382{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1507577013722{margin-top: -24% !important;margin-bottom: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156919″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1512596219684{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”181085″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1555438183859{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156658″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1512596383105{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

Help sales and marketing teams work in unison by syncing CRM and marketing automation

Wish your marketing automation platform and your CRM spoke the same language? Wish no more. Keep your teams in sync by integrating PieSync and SharpSpring.

PieSync helps you seamlessly sync your contacts between apps two-way and in real time, so you only have to enter customer data once. Hear from PieSync expert Laura Lee and from SharpSpring agency partner Yusuf Young, founder of FunnelBud. They’ll cover:

  • Tips and tricks for connecting apps – and why it matters
  • How SharpSpring and PieSync work together
  • A brief case study on app integration

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1507570006488{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Watch It Now:

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy


[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”]
Your Hosts:

Laura Lee Schultz

Head of Partner Marketing, PieSync

Laura manages PieSync’s partnerships and implements highly-organized co-marketing strategies that raise PieSync’s visibility on a day-to-day basis through webinars, contributed articles and other various initiatives.

Yusuf Young

Founder, FunnelBud

FunnelBud helps companies implement marketing automation to grow B2B sales. As a certified consultant in HubSpot, Pardot and SharpSpring, Yusuf founded FunnelBud agency in 2015. He now offers his digital marketing expertise to Swedish companies, helping them leverage effective and easy-to-use marketing automation and CRM solutions.

Koertni Adams

Partner Enablement Manager, SharpSpring

Partner Enablement Manager, SharpSpringKoertni came to SharpSpring from a partner agency. She has walked in your shoes pitching and using marketing automation. She now develops content, programs, events and other resources to help agency partners become even more proficient at growing revenues and serving clients.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Ready to learn more?

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.

START HERE
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
